column1: Operations, Logistics and Supply Chain Management (MSc)
column5: Develop an advanced understanding of conceptual, analytical and practical aspects of production and delivery of products and servicesThis course is for graduates who want to work in the managerial or consulting areas of operations, logistics or supply chain management.Modern companies make their products and services in locations all over the world. Effective operations management is essential to giving the best customer experience in an environmentally friendly way. You’ll graduate with the expertise in operations and supply chain management that employers look for.Key
